# looker_role_groups (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "looker_role" "embed_role" {
  name              = "Embed User Role"
  permission_set_id = looker_permission_set.embed_permission_set.id
  model_set_id      = looker_model_set.model_set.id
}
```
